short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows a career history form for the candidate

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension integrates Jobvite ATS with the Topgrading Workflow. Jobvite users will be able to send Topgrading CHF invitations to the candidates directly from the extension without ever switching to Topgrading. It also auto-creates Jobs in Topgrading with all details and formatting in place. When the candidates completed their CHF, plugin opens the docs in a tab and automatically uploads attachments to Jobvite. All from just one click!
